title: Clinic Details
text: HealthCare Plus Clinic. Location: 123 Main St. Parking available in rear lot. Hours: Mon-Fri 9AM-5PM.

title: Insurance & Billing
text: We accept Blue Cross Blue Shield, Aetna, Cigna, UnitedHealthcare. Payment methods: card, cash.

title: Visit Preparation
text: Bring photo ID, insurance card, previous records if any.

title: Policies
text: Cancellation: 24-hour notice. Late arrival: 15 minutes grace period. COVID protocols: masks optional.
